meanings.definition: exhibiters: people who display or present something
meanings.sent1: The exhibiters proudly showcased their artwork at the gallery.
meanings.sent2: The exhibiters set up their booths at the craft fair.
meanings.sent3: The exhibiters accidentally swapped their paintings and caused confusion.
meanings.sent4: The exhibiters were like shining stars in the art world.
meanings.sent5: The exhibiters' creativity shone brightly at the exhibition.

meanings.definition: exhibiters: those who participate in an exhibition or show
meanings.sent1: The exhibiters eagerly awaited their turn to perform on stage.
meanings.sent2: The exhibiters rehearsed tirelessly for the upcoming dance competition.
meanings.sent3: The exhibiters wore funny hats to stand out in the show.
meanings.sent4: The exhibiters were the heart and soul of the event.
meanings.sent5: The exhibiters' passion for showcasing their talents was contagious.
